{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "# Basic statistics and spectra\n",
    "To begin, we configure a coalescent object from which can easily access all available statistics. In this example we specify 10 lineages and a 4-epoch piecewise-constant demography."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": true,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.159729Z",
     "start_time": "2023-07-23T18:56:42.619832Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import phasegen as pg\n",
    "\n",
    "# construct coalescent object\n",
    "coal = pg.PiecewiseTimeHomogeneousCoalescent(\n",
    "    n=10,\n",
    "    demography=pg.PiecewiseTimeHomogeneousDemography(\n",
    "        pop_sizes=[1.2, 10, 0.8, 10],\n",
    "        times=[0, 0.3, 1, 1.4]\n",
    "    )\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We can now access basic properties like the mean tree height and the variance in total branch length. These are computed on the fly and cached for later use."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "11.436822782034213"
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "coal.tree_height.mean"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.175117Z",
     "start_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.160089Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "505.12890597436456"
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "coal.total_branch_length.var"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.196077Z",
     "start_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.174935Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "For the tree height, probability distributions are available, which can readily be visualized.\n"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 800x400 with 2 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "\n",
    "_, axs = plt.subplots(ncols=2, figsize=(8, 4))\n",
    "\n",
    "coal.tree_height.plot_pdf(ax=axs[0], show=False)\n",
    "coal.tree_height.plot_cdf(ax=axs[1]);"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.972588Z",
     "start_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.186008Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We can also obtain the expected site-frequency spectrum."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "outputs": [

    "coal.sfs.mean.plot();"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:18.080684Z",
     "start_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:17.976111Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We can also access the 2-SFS which is a covariance matrix of the frequency counts. The entries of the main diagonal denote the variance of the SFS."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 512x384 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "coal.sfs.cov.plot();"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-07-23T18:57:25.861468Z",

    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "Alternatively, we can plot the 2-SFS as a heatmap."
   ],
   "metadata": {

   }
  },

   ],
